sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO ROLES (ROLE_ID, ROLE_NAME, UPDATED_BY) VALUES (#roleId#, #roleName#, #updateBy#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE ROLES SET ROLE_NAME = #roleName#, UPDATED_BY = #updateBy# WHERE ROLE_ID=#roleId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT ROLE_ID AS roleId, ROLE_NAME AS roleName FROM ROLES WHERE ROLE_ID=#id#

SELECT * FROM (SELECT page.*, ROWNUM rnum FROM (SELECT ROLE_ID AS roleId, ROLE_NAME AS roleName FROM ROLES
UPPER(ROLE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
ORDER BY ROLE_NAME ASC) page WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow#) WHERE rnum >= #startRow#

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM ROLES
UPPER(ROLE_NAME) LIKE UPPER('%'||#value#||'%')
SELECT ROLE_ID AS roleId, ROLE_NAME AS roleName FROM ROLES WHERE ROLE_ID !=1

SELECT ROLE.ROLE_ID AS roleId, ROLE.ROLE_NAME AS roleName FROM PROJECT_MEMBERS PROJ_MBR JOIN ROLES ROLE ON PROJ_MBR.ROLE_ID = ROLE.ROLE_ID WHERE NVL(PROJ_MBR.PROJECT_MEMBER_STATUS, 1) = 1 AND PROJ_MBR.EMPLOYEE_ID = #employeeId# AND PROJ_MBR.PROJECT_ID = #projectId#
